codeSystems.name: TherapeuticAreasValueSet
codeSystems.title: Therapeutic Areas for Clinical Trials
codeSystems.description: A value set of therapeutic areas relevant to clinical trials.

codeSystems.name: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.title: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.description: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

codeSystems.name: AllLanguages
codeSystems.title: All Languages
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all possible codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

codeSystems.name: ConditionProblemDiagnosisCodes
codeSystems.title: Condition/Problem/Diagnosis Codes
codeSystems.description: Example value set for Condition/Problem/Diagnosis codes.

codeSystems.name: JurisdictionValueSet
codeSystems.title: Jurisdiction ValueSet
codeSystems.description:
This value set defines a base set of codes for country, country subdivision and region    for indicating where a resource is intended to be used.   
   
   Note: The codes for countries and country subdivisions are taken from    [ISO 3166](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html)    while the codes for "supra-national" regions are from    [UN Standard country or area codes for statistical use (M49)](http://unstats.un.org/unsd/methods/m49/m49.htm).

codeSystems.name: CommonLanguages
codeSystems.title: Common Languages
codeSystems.description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

codeSystems.name: LinkType
codeSystems.title: Link Type
codeSystems.description: The type of link between this Patient resource and another Patient/RelatedPerson resource.

codeSystems.name: MaritalStatusCodes
codeSystems.title: Marital Status Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

codeSystems.name: PatientContactRelationship
codeSystems.title: Patient Contact Relationship
codeSystems.description: The nature of the relationship between the patient and the contact person.

codeSystems.name: PublicationStatus
codeSystems.title: PublicationStatus
codeSystems.description: The lifecycle status of an artifact.

codeSystems.name: ResearchStudyArmType
codeSystems.title: Research Study Arm Type
codeSystems.description: Codes for the main intent of the study.

codeSystems.name: ResearchStudyFocusType
codeSystems.title: Research Study Focus Type
codeSystems.description: Codes for the main intent of the study.

codeSystems.name: ResearchStudyObjectiveType
codeSystems.title: Research Study Objective Type
codeSystems.description: Codes for the kind of study objective.

codeSystems.name: ResearchStudyPartyOrgType
codeSystems.title: Research Study Party Organization Type
codeSystems.description: This is a ResearchStudy's party organization type.

codeSystems.name: ResearchStudyPartyRole
codeSystems.title: Research Study Party Role
codeSystems.description: This is a ResearchStudy's party role.

codeSystems.name: ResearchStudyPhase
codeSystems.title: Research Study Phase
codeSystems.description: Codes for the stage in the progression of a therapy from initial experimental use in humans in clinical trials to post-market evaluation.

codeSystems.name: ResearchStudyPrimaryPurposeType
codeSystems.title: Research Study Primary Purpose Type
codeSystems.description: Codes for the main intent of the study.

codeSystems.name: ResearchStudyReasonStopped
codeSystems.title: Research Study Reason Stopped
codeSystems.description: Codes for why the study ended prematurely.

codeSystems.name: ResearchStudyStatus
codeSystems.title: Research Study Status
codeSystems.description: Codes that convey the current status of the research study.

codeSystems.name: StudyDesign
codeSystems.title: Study Design
codeSystems.description: This is a set of terms for study design characteristics.

codeSystems.name: TitleType
codeSystems.title: Title Type
codeSystems.description: Used to express the reason and specific aspect for the variant title, such as language and specific language.
